alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 14 at 9:36AM CDT until July 18 at 10:16PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. For the Tennesse-Tombigbee River ...including Tibbee, Stennis Lock & Dam, Columbus, Macon...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Water surrounds sewage lagoon west of Macon; however, access road is not blocked. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 29.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 32.3 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 32.6 feet on 01/04/2020. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Noxubee River Macon 28.0 29.6 Fri 9 am CDT 32.3 32.0 30.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
